job.title: Lead Software Engineer - 100% remote, eCommerce website
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Human Resources
job.description: stronguJob Descriptionbrustrongulli This client is a highgrowth up and coming eCommerce platform that focuses on creating products that are good for people and good for the environment You will be in a high impact role where your code matters and has direct impact on the enduserlili The client is looking for a great Lead Engineer Full stack with emphasis on the back end who can help build out their platform and lead a teambrliulRole amp Responsibilitiesbrulli From ordering to customer accounts to product catalogs and pricing and commissions youll work across the sets of services and functionality we provide to customerslili The ideal candidate will be able to collaborate with our topnotch engineering team amp product managers and build great services and features for our customers and then work with our highlyskilled engineers in both code reviews and architecture discussions to help drive forward a cohesive code baselili Develop new backend functionality amp componentslili Drive engineering efficiency improvements through build tooling CICD pipeline improvements architectural improvement tech debt paydown etcbrliulstronguSkills amp Qualificationsbrustrongulli 6 years experience building robust full stack functionalitylili 5 Years of Experience in TSQLlili 2 years leading teamsprojects with iterative deliverableslili Cloud experience GCP or AWSbrliulstronguBenefitsbrustrongulli 165175k base salary with 10 annual bonus based on company performancelili 100 remotelili Full benefitslili Company shuts down the week of July 4thbrliulIf you are interested in this position please email an updated copy of your resume to stholenjeffersonfrankcom
